Class GroqClientFactory

java.lang.Object
com.groq.api.client.GroqClientFactory
public final class GroqClientFactory extends Object
Factory for creating Groq API clients and related components.

    • createDefaultHttpClient

      public static HttpClient createDefaultHttpClient()
      Creates a default HTTP client for the Groq API.
      Returns:
      A configured HttpClient instance.

    • createClient

      public static GroqApiClient createClient(String apiKey)
      Creates a new Groq API client with the provided API key.
      Parameters:
      apiKey - The API key to use for authentication.
      Returns:
      A configured GroqApiClient instance.

      Creates a new Groq API client with the provided configuration.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      A configured GroqApiClient instance.

    • createClient

      public static GroqApiClient createClient(GroqApiConfig config, HttpClient httpClient, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper)
      Creates a new Groq API client with the provided configuration and HTTP client.
      Parameters:
      config - The configuration for the client.
      httpClient - Custom HTTP client.
      objectMapper - JSON object mapper.
      Returns:
      A configured GroqApiClient instance.
